line_1: Where crowding Joys my grateful Heart dilate;
line_2: PAULTONS affords me next a kind Retreat,

line_1: On th' Escape with Joy dilate,
line_2: Whilst Three Sharers in his Fate,

line_1: But when our Souls their Force dilate,
line_2: And Thoughts grow up to Wit's Estate;

line_1: Sickness and cares your bliss dilate,
line_2: And pain but whets your lust of hate.

line_1: What hopes sublime our ravish'd soul dilate!
line_2: O fairest of all fair! O blissful state!

line_1: Warm at my heart new hopes dilate,
line_2: But rising from the stroke of fate,

line_1: With labour'd skill would all her joys dilate,
line_2: Sublime their sense, and lengthen out their date;
